0.title: Annual Average Precipitation
0.subTitle: [stationName]
0.caption: Average annual precipitation. The lowest (min) and highest (max) precipitation of the month.

1.title: Annual Average Precipitation Difference from Baseline
1.subTitle: [stationName] Difference between yearly average and average for [baseline]
1.caption: Difference between the yearly average precipitation and the average precipitation for the baseline period, typically 1961 to 1990.
